title: download error(Please help me)
body:
I was trying to download the game again, but they are keep saying "update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information" 
Can you please how can I solve the problem?
(I'm not good at computer so please explain in easy way)
Thank you.

replies.body: I'd like to help get this fixed up and get you into game, but I need just a little more information.  At what percent during the patcher are you getting this error?  Let me know!

Around 80~88% shows error. I really want to play please help me.
Thanks.

Thanks!  At this point during the process, your patcher is trying to grab updates through our patching servers but is failing  You'll want to go over the instructions in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and get a solid line between your network and patching server.  I hope that helps!

Sorry I tried but still not working......
downloading stops on 86%..so sad
Should I wipe it out C: drive and try again like a new computer?

Sorry to hear the issue is still happening.  I don't believe remote control is something we're offering, but even if we did there could be issues if you're having connection problems.  

Since it's still occurring, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs and attach it to your ticket for more  context.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
Can you guys do remote control to fix the game problem because I'm not really good at computer....

Thank you so much I'll try right now!!
(If doesn't work I'll come back right away)...
